definition: producing exhaustion, the act of having on your person as a covering or adornment
details:
adjective
- producing exhaustion
= synonyms: exhausting
noun
- the act of having on your person as a covering or adornment
= synonyms: wear
- (geology) the mechanical process of wearing or grinding something down (as by particles washing over it)
= synonyms: eroding, eating away, wearing away, erosion
